ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Solo Spectre Camp Break?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... My other concern is etiquette. Nobody was around the spectres and the island was unbroken. As soon as I broke the spawn there were 3 other groups who
ygData.messageBody:
>
My other concern is etiquette. Nobody was around the spectres and the
island was unbroken. As soon as I broke the spawn there were 3 other groups
who jumped in and started pulling spectres. One even ran us over with their
pull while we were medding and healing. I guess it's bound to happen since
I'm pulling the spectres so far away. Seems rude on from one perspective,
but from another it seems inevitable unless you are sitting smack dab on
the island.
>

I've found that a lot on Bertoxx. At first, I just thought it was a
coincidence that when my group broke the spawn up a bit, dr00ds started
pulling singles to kite. However, of the past 4 or 5 times we've hunted the
specs, the story's always the same.

Also, there's limited flat areas around the Spectre island to pull to that
aren't occupied by lower levels. Typically, most people pull to the side
with the inn on it, or at the top near the Dervish camp. It's inevitable
that someone will pull across you, or be chasing a spectre through you,
especially if you're medding/healing on it's path.
